newsitem.title: USA: MTCI restates Q1 and Q2, reports loss in Q3.
newsitem.headline: MTCI restates Q1 and Q2, reports loss in Q3.

text.p: Management Technologies Inc said Friday that as a result of an internal audit, it has restated earnings for the first and second quarters of its fiscal year. It also announced a loss in the current quarter.

For the first quarter, ended July 31, 1996, the company reported a net loss of $421,000 or $0.02 per share, on total revenues of $6.762 million, compared to a net loss of $2.155 million, or $0.14 per share, on total revenues of $6.266 million for the quarter ended July 31, 1995.

For the second quarter, ended October 31, 1996, the company reported a net loss of $1.118 million, or $0.03 per share, on total revenues of $6.258 million, compared to a net loss of $2.552 million, or $0.12 per share, on total revenues of $4.514 million for the quarter ended October 31, 1995.
Management Technologies also reported its results Friday for the third quarter.

The company said it posted a net loss of $1.235 million, or $0.02 per share, on total revenues of $4.287 million for the three months ended January 31. Results for the same period in 1996 were a net loss of $791,000, or $0.04 per share, on total revenues of $5.812 million.
Management Technologies specializes in the development, implementation and support of international banking software and integrated trading room solutions.
